alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwest Wisconsin through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Harpers Ferry to near Platteville. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Viroqua around 550 PM CDT. Muscoda around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Highway 61 And County T, Montfort, Highway 80 And County C C, Gillingham, Neptune, County Roads A And Z, Fargo, Blue River, Gays Mills and Highways 80 And 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
